data.eml:eml: New species of Trichogramma Westwood (Hymenoptera: Trichogrammatidae) associated with lepidopterous eggs in Brazil

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Querino, R. B., Zucchi, R. A. (2003): New species of Trichogramma Westwood (Hymenoptera: Trichogrammatidae) associated with lepidopterous eggs in Brazil. Zootaxa 163: 1-10, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.156796
